sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element packageinfo groups elements containing information about the package, namely a description and some dependency relationship(s).
The description sub-element provides for a description of the packge.
The requires sub-element provides for a relationship (dependancy) to other defined packages in the profile.
The utilizes sub-element provdes for a relationship (uses / optional) to other defined packages in the profile.

sect2.title: Examples

screen.userinput:
<package name="gimp" version="1.2.3">
<packageinfo>
<description>
<para>The gimp package contains the GNU Image Manipulation Program. This is useful for :</para>
<list> <item>photo retouching,</item> <item>image composition,</item> <item>image authoring.</item> </list>
</description>
<requires><name>gtk+</name></requires>
<utilizes><name>libtiff</name></utilizes> <utilizes><name>libpng</name></utilizes> <utilizes><name>libjpeg</name></utilizes> <utilizes><name>aalib</name></utilizes> <utilizes><name>mpeg_lib</name></utilizes> <utilizes><name>python</name></utilizes>
</packageinfo>
....
</package>

sect2.para: There is no equivalent bash script for the element.
